JPN:
I'm sorry but you cant change your
name while sending a telegram

Come back when were not
still sending a telegram.

After all, we're the ones
taking care of the mail
in this<CMD>008027000580</CMD> Town<CMD>008027000180</CMD>.

<CMD>18802700729b27000280</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700508027000a8027000280</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27007d81</CMD>But you know...<BREAK>These guys in the<CMD>008027000380</CMD> Post Office <CMD>008027000180</CMD>
don't understand it!

If you take your eyes off
of them for just a second...

They will slack off Playing Games,
Sleeping or Sunbathing!

I manage to wrangle them
all back in here mostly no issue.

<CMD>18802700729b27000480</CMD><CMD>17802700729b27000a8027000a8027000180</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27007f81</CMD>I'll have to make arrangements
so the mail won't be late.

MY staff the<CMD>008027000380</CMD> Mail-Cats <CMD>008027000180</CMD>
will slack off at a moments notice.
However if they work too much...
They'll get sick and take a day off.

No matter how much they slack off,
they still work..

<CMD>18802700729b27000380</CMD><CMD>17802700729b270001802700048027000080</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27003081</CMD>If one of us miss a day of work
the rest of us work overtime.

Then the other guys get sick
and take time off...

It's a never ending
cycle from there...

The amount of work
you want them to do...
Verses the amount they slack off?

<CMD>18802700729b27000680</CMD><CMD>17802700729b270001802700048027000080</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27007e81</CMD>But then again, I've never
had a telegram fail me yet.

<CMD>18802700729b27000180</CMD><CMD>17802700729b270001802700048027000280</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27005581</CMD>Surprising, right?
I wouldn't believe it
if there was an error.
But.. I don't know about<CMD>008027000580</CMD> Other Towns <CMD>008027000180</CMD>But in this<CMD>008027000580</CMD> Town <CMD>008027000180</CMD>?

I've never made a mistake,
so I'm not going to
let them either.

<CMD>18802700729b27000280</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700508027000a8027000280</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27007d81</CMD>If I'd made a mistake,
I'd have repaired the damage.

I'll have to keep an eye on them.
To make sure they don't mess up.

That jerk... he's got a
funny way of talking
to me.

<CMD>18802700729b27000280</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700508027000a8027000280</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27007d81</CMD>'Sir, what can I do for you?'
What the heck is wrong with the guy?

You're making it sound
like I'm not polite enough!

I won't be intimidated by
customers like he is.
Just because you're a little taller than me...
Doesn't mean you have to look down on people!
<CMD>008027000380</CMD>ピカード<CMD>008027000180</CMD>のヤロウは<BREAK>とにかく　{気|き}にくわねぇ
{特|とく}に　どこがって<BREAK>{言|い}われたら…
{背筋|せすじ}を　シャンと<BREAK>のばして　{直角|ちょっかく}に<BREAK>オジギしやがるんだぜ？
しかも　レイセツは<BREAK>セッキャクギョウの<BREAK>キホン　とか{言|い}いやがって
だけど　あのヤロウの<BREAK>すかしたツラよりは<BREAK>マシなはずだぜ？<CMD>49802700df8027000280</CMD>
<CMD>008027000380</CMD>ピカード<CMD>008027000180</CMD>のヤロウは<BREAK>{気|き}にいらねぇが　{前|まえ}に<BREAK><CMD>008027000580</CMD>ハロゲンデパート<CMD>008027000180</CMD>　{行|い}った{時|とき}
{買|か}おうと{思|おも}った　こたつが<BREAK>{品切|しなぎ}れで　あきらめようとした<BREAK>おれを　{引|ひ}き{止|と}めて
<CMD>18802700729b27000780</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700088027000a8027000180</CMD>あっちこっちに{電話|でんわ}かけて<BREAK>その{日|ひ}のうちに<BREAK>{取|と}り{寄|よ}せてくれたんだよな…
お{客|きゃく}さまは{神|かみ}サマです<BREAK>なんて{話|はなし}　{今|いま}じゃ<BREAK>{通用|つうよう}しねぇんだよ！
ちょっと{親切|しんせつ}にされたくらいで<BREAK>おれが{見直|みなお}すとでも<BREAK>{思|おも}ってるのかね！？
あの{上品|じょうひん}ヅラを<BREAK>なおさないかぎり<BREAK>おれは　{見直|みなお}さないぜ！
This is, you know, my <CMD>008027000580</CMD> Post Office<CMD>008027000180</CMD>.

If you write a telegram to
a friend or loved one...

It's not my job to
deliver the telegram.

My little mail cats are
going to deliver the telegram.<CMD>49802700d88027005f80</CMD>

A telegram is filled with feelings
from the person who wrote it.

We're carrying those
feelings with us.
Wether its a rainy day, windy day or a snow day.

I gotta get the Telegrams
delivered on time.

<CMD>158027001882</CMD><CMD>3a8027000cfe</CMD>This telegram will be
delivered with the responsibility.

You dont have enough
Rich do you?

<CMD>18802700729b27000080</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700088027000a8027000180</CMD><CMD>16802700729b27006981</CMD>Telegram, right?
Who are you writing a telegram to?

You're going to write a
telegram to <CMD>f78127002fa0</CMD> ?
I'm sorry... the postman is very busy.

I'm afraid I can't send the
telegram... please try again?

<CMD>18802700729b27000080</CMD><CMD>17802700729b270001802700048027000080</CMD>Here.
I've got a delivery just for you
and we didn't skip it.

Is that so?
 Let me know if you
need anything else.<CMD>49802700d88027005f80</CMD>

<CMD>18802700729b27000780</CMD><CMD>17802700729b2700088027000a8027000180</CMD>It's almost closing time.
Sorry but you have to leave.

Is that so?
 Let me know if you
need anything else.

Welcome in.
this just so happens to be the<CMD>008027000580</CMD> Post Office <CMD>008027000180</CMD>.
